properties:
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM REPORT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT CON_NO , CON_TITLE , M.MEM_ID , CON_DATE , ANSWER FROM CONTACT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CON_REPLY DESC, CON_DATE ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT /*com.kh.admin.contact.model.dao.ContactDao#insertContact()*/ INTO CONTACT ( CON_NO , CON_TYPE , CON_TITLE , CON_CONTENT , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CONNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT CON_NO , CON_TITLE , CON_TYPE , CON_DATE , M.MEM_ID , CON_CONTENT FROM CONTACT C JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE CON_NO = ? AND C.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CON_NO , CON_TITLE , M.MEM_ID , CON_DATE , ANSWER FROM CONTACT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CON_REPLY DESC, CON_DATE ASC
SELECT CON_NO , CON_TITLE , M.MEM_ID , CON_TYPE , CON_TITLE , CON_CONTENT , CON_DATE FROM CONTACT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE CON_NO = ? AND C.STATUS = 'Y'
